title: Family-Friendly Niagara Falls Retreat with Falls Views, Indoor Pool & Acclaimed Steakhouse
description: Offering extraordinary views over the magnificent Niagara Falls, Crowne Plaza Niagara Falls - Fallsview, an IHG Hotel, offers guests a mesmerising stay in a truly historic location. Savour a delectable breakfast overlooking the falls at The Rainbow Room, enjoy a leisurely swim in the indoor pool or head to Prime Steakhouse - rated Niagara Falls' top-rated restaurant on Tripadvisor - for A-grade cuts, seared to perfection.
